channel.title: Glitch: You can skip the tentacles once
channel.description:
In blast pit, I am able to skip the tentacles by dropping down from the second level to the bottom level through a hole in the grating.
This is obviously intended in some manner (I do not break the game to do it) but I am reporting it as a glitch because it seriously cheapens this boss battle, as you only ever have to go through the rocket fire chamber twice.
bm_c1a4b setpos -2458.110107 -2290.833008 1216.031250;setang -39.132500 -54.346554 0.000000

item.title: Glitch: You can skip the tentacles once
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Yeah, I used that, and actually thought it was an intentional bypass for the vigilant. Saved me a grenade and a couple seconds.

Also, it only saves you time if you go to the Gas Pumps first (which makes sense, seeing as it’s closer to where you enter, but it’s still totally up to the player).

Read full topic
item.source: Glitch: You can skip the tentacles once

item.description:
I can confirm this too. Dropped there by mistake twice.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch: You can skip the tentacles once

item.description:
Yeah, but you have to get back up still. And you could actually do the same thing in original.
